org.richfaces.component

Interface MetaComponentResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAccordion, AbstractAutocomplete, AbstractCalendar, AbstractCollapsiblePanel, AbstractCollapsibleSubTable, AbstractCommandButton, AbstractCommandLink, AbstractDataGrid, AbstractDataTable, AbstractExtendedDataTable, AbstractProgressBar, AbstractRegion, AbstractSelect, AbstractTabPanel, AbstractTogglePanel, AbstractTooltip, AbstractTree, AbstractTreeNode, UIAccordion, UIAutocomplete, UICalendar, UICollapsiblePanel, UICollapsibleSubTable, UICommandButton, UICommandLink, UIDataGrid, UIDataTable, UIDataTableBase, UIExtendedDataTable, UIProgressBar, UIRegion, UISelect, UITabPanel, UITogglePanel, UITooltip, UITree, UITreeNode

    public interface MetaComponentResolver
    MetaComponentResolver interface is used to customize resolution of meta-components
    Author:
    Nick Belaevski

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char META_COMPONENT_SEPARATOR_CHAR 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String resolveClientId(javax.faces.context.FacesContext facesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent contextComponent, String metaComponentId)
      Resolves and returns string identifying supported meta-component or null if provided meta-component name is not a supported one.
      String substituteUnresolvedClientId(javax.faces.context.FacesContext facesContext, javax.faces.component.UIComponent contextComponent, String metaComponentId)
      Provides replacement for unresolved meta-component names.

    • Field Detail

      • META_COMPONENT_SEPARATOR_CHAR

        static final char META_COMPONENT_SEPARATOR_CHAR
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • resolveClientId

        String resolveClientId(javax.faces.context.FacesContext facesContext,
                     javax.faces.component.UIComponent contextComponent,
                     String metaComponentId)
        Resolves and returns string identifying supported meta-component or null if provided meta-component name is not a supported one.
        Parameters:
        facesContext - - current instance of FacesContext
        contextComponent - - instance of UIComponent that requested resolution of meta-component
        metaComponentId - - name of meta-component (without leading '@' sign)
        Returns:
        clientId, one of supported meta-names such as @all, @this, etc. or null

      • substituteUnresolvedClientId

        String substituteUnresolvedClientId(javax.faces.context.FacesContext facesContext,
                                  javax.faces.component.UIComponent contextComponent,
                                  String metaComponentId)
        Provides replacement for unresolved meta-component names. Returns identifier string for the chosen substitution or null
        Parameters:
        facesContext - - current instance of FacesContext
        contextComponent - - instance of UIComponent that requested resolution of meta-component
        metaComponentId - - name of meta-component (without leading '@' sign)
        Returns:
        clientId, one of supported meta-names such as @all, @this, etc. or null
